meanings.definition: The state of being first or foremost.
meanings.sent1: In the race, the primacy went to the fastest runner.
meanings.sent2: The primacy of safety is crucial in any workplace.
meanings.sent3: The primacy of the cat in the house was evident when it claimed the comfiest spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The primacy of the sun in our solar system is unquestionable.
meanings.sent5: The primacy of kindness in her heart shone through in every action she took.

meanings.definition: The fact of being primary or most important.
meanings.sent1: The primacy of family in his life was evident in all his decisions.
meanings.sent2: In the team, the primacy of teamwork is emphasized above all else.
meanings.sent3: The primacy of chocolate in her list of favorite foods was quite amusing to her friends.
meanings.sent4: The primacy of the queen in the chess game led to a strategic victory.
meanings.sent5: The primacy of education in shaping young minds cannot be overstated.
